doctor resigns THE British prime minister's director of communications Andy Coulson has resigned amid accusations that he was aware of phone hacking by his journalists while working as editor of the`` News of the World'' newspaper. Football fans cheer for hard hits all the time, and if the Bears were facing the Eagles, virtually every Bears fan would have joined Buehrle in hoping that Michael Vick got viciously hit. As James Harrison said, I don't want to injure anybody... I try to hurt people. In football, football fans root for players to get hurt. Football players try to inflict hurt. I'd find it easier to censure Buehrle if football's hypocrisy on pain weren't so transparent. Report

The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make`` the centerpiece'' of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia.
